resources.string:
This End-User License Agreement (“EULA”) is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity), the end-user, and the author of the QB Calculator Software ("Owner"). This EULA permits you to use a single copy, or multiples copies of the software product identified above, which includes computer software and may include associated media, printed materials, and on-line or electronic documentation. By installing, copying, or otherwise using the QB Calculator Software, you agree to be bounded by the terms of this EULA. If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use the QB Calculator Software. Do not use the Software until you have carefully read the following Agreement.


1. GRANT OF LICENSE


Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you are granted a limited, non-exclusive, license to download, install, and use the QB Calculator Software. The QB Calculator software is licensed, not sold.


2. RESTRICTIONS


You may not decompile, disassemble or otherwise reverse engineer the QB Calculator software, or engage in any other activities to obtain underlying information that is not visible to the user in connection with normal use of the QB Calculator software. You agree not to modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute, or create derivative works based upon this software. You agree not to publicize or distribute any registration code algorithms, information, or registration codes used by this software without permission from the Owner. You may not use the QB Calculator Software to engage in or allow others to engage in any illegal activity where the QB Calculator Software is accessed and used. You may not use the QB Calculator Software to engage in any activity that will violate the rights of third parties, including, without limitation, through the use, public display, public performance, reproduction, distribution, or modification of communications or materials that infringe copyrights, trademarks, publicity rights, privacy rights, other proprietary rights, or rights against defamation of third parties.


3. OWNERSHIP


This license provides you with limited rights to use the QB Calculator Software. The Owner retains all ownership, right, title and interest in, to and of the QB Calculator Software and all copies of it. All rights not specifically granted in this license, including domestic and international copyrights, are reserved by Jason Barkes.


4. COPYRIGHT


This software is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties.


5. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES


THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED “AS IS,” WITH NO WARRANTIES WHATSOEVER. THE OWNER EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW ALL EXPRESS, IMPLIED, AND STATUTORY WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT OF PROPRIETARY RIGHTS AND ANY WARRANTIES REGARDING THE SECURITY, RELIABILITY, TIMELINESS, AND PERFORMANCE OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE. THE OWNER DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE FUNCTIONS CONTAINED IN THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, THAT THE OPERATION OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, OR THAT DEFECTS IN THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE WILL BE CORRECTED. THE OWNER DOES NOT WARRANT OR MAKE ANY REPRESENTATIONS REGARDING THE USE OR THE RESULTS OF THE USE OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE IN TERMS OF THEIR CORRECTNESS, ACCURACY, RELIABILITY OR OTHERWISE. THE OWNER DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT USERS WILL BE ABLE TO ACCESS OR USE THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE AT TIMES OR LOCATIONS OF THEIR CHOOSING, OR THAT THE OWNER WILL HAVE ADEQUATE CAPACITY FOR ANY USER’S REQUIREMENTS. NO ORAL OR WRITTEN STATEMENT, INFORMATION OR ADVICE GIVEN BY THE OWNER, OR RESPECTIVE EMPLOYEES, DISTRIBUTORS, DEALERS, OR AGENTS SHALL CREATE ANY WARRANTIES.


YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT YOUR DOWNLOAD AND/OR USE OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE IS AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK AND THAT YOU WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGES TO YOUR DEVICE OR LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM THE DOWNLOAD OR USE OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE.


SOME STATES OR OTHER JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF IMPLIED WARRANTIES, SO THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. YOU MAY ALSO HAVE OTHER RIGHTS THAT VARY FROM STATE TO STATE AND JURISDICTION TO JURISDICTION.


6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY


UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL THE OWNER, OR SUPPLIERS, RESELLERS, PARTNERS OR RESPECTIVE AFFILIATES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM OR RELATED TO THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE, WHETHER SUCH CLAIM IS BASED ON WARRANTY, CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR OTHERWISE, (EVEN IF ANY SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES). WITHOUT LIMITING THE FOREGOING, THE TOTAL AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF THE OWNER, AND HIS SUPPLIERS, RESELLERS, PARTNERS AND RESPECTIVE AFFILIATES ARISING FROM OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT, IF ANY, PAID BY YOU TO THE OWNER FOR THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE. IF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED WITHOUT CHARGE, THEN THE OWNER AND SUPPLIERS SHALL HAVE NO LIABILITY TO YOU WHATSOEVER.


THE FOREGOING LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY SHALL APPLY WHETHER THE DAMAGES ARISE FROM USE OR MISUSE OF AND RELIANCE ON THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE, FROM INABILITY TO USE THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE, TO USE, OR FROM THE INTERRUPTION, SUSPENSION, OR TERMINATION OF THE QB CALCULATOR SOFTWARE (INCLUDING SUCH DAMAGES INCURRED BY THIRD PARTIES). SUCH LIMITATION SHALL APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING A FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY AND TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW. SOME STATES OR OTHER JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR DIRECT DAMAGES, SO THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS AND EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.


7. MISCELLANEOUS


The Owner reserves the right to modify or amend this Agreement at any time and for any reason or for no reason at all, at his sole discretion, without notice.


If any provision in this Agreement should be held illegal or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, such provision shall be modified to the extent necessary to render it enforceable without losing its intent, or severed from this Agreement if no such modification is possible, and other provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. A waiver by either party of any term or condition of this Agreement or any breach thereof, in any one instance, shall not waive such term or condition or any subsequent breach thereof.
